description: This table contains the audit trail data for the anesthesia responsible staff activity. It contains a list of all the edits made to the information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AN_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who is responsible for the anesthesia record.

columns.name: AN_PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anesthesia staff type category number for the provider's responsible role.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AN_BEGIN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the provider began responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the provider ended responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who documented the responsible staff information.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the entry was modified.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_LN
columns.description: The line number from the anesthesia staff audit trail table that contains the previous information on this staff member's responsibility.

columns.name: AN_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the responsible entry this value contains was deleted from the anesthesia staff table.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
